Legacy Election Model

Source: R/model_legacy.R
model_legacy.Rd

Approximately implements legacy county-level models based on 2022 Edison statistical specification.

Usage

model_legacy(d, past, config = model_legacy_config())

model_legacy_total(d, past, config = model_legacy_config())

model_legacy_cand(d, d_total, past, config = model_legacy_config())

Arguments

d

Data for a single race in the format of check_data, filtered to a single time with filter_asof().

past

<tidy-eval> a vector of past vote values.

config

A list of configuration options; see model_legacy_config().

Value

model_legacy returns a race-wide data frame in prediction format; see check_data. The intermediate functions model_legacy_total and model_legacy_cand return an augmented data frame.

Functions

  • model_legacy(): Combined model

  • model_legacy_total(): Total vote model

  • model_legacy_cand(): Candidate vote model

Examples

now = lubridate::ymd_hms("2024-11-06 21:40:00 UTC")
d = filter_asof(nj, now)

model_legacy_total(d, past)
